biography: Co-Founder @arata.in | Panelist on The Inventor Challenge | Shark Tank India Season 3

latestIgtvVideos.caption:
I had a fantastic time shooting for @gqindia @collectiveindia @poloralphlauren, some of my favourite brands. Thank you for considering me as one of India's #GameChangers

--

Posted @withregram • @gqindia Envisioned for the Game Changers, India's fashion forward icons, Manvendra Singh of MRS Hotels, Dhruv Madhok of @arata.in and Gautam Raj Anand of Hubhopper upgrade their style senses with their panache partner, Polo Ralph Lauren. They add to their unmatched charm and dynamism with the brand's sleek ensembles made with a fine blend of technology, creativity and history. Whether it's a laidback event or pivotal party, nothing does the magic like Polo Ralph Lauren's stellar designs and appealing fits. Made to etch a memorable mark, here's a brand India's pioneers vouch for!

@collectiveindia @poloralphlauren 
#PoloRLStyle #GameChangers #PoloRalphLauren

latestPosts.caption:
I believe in the power of manifestation. A few years ago, I had told @dhruvbhasin1987 that one day, we'll get to a place where global brands will see the value in what we set out to build at @arata.in. I'm grateful to have @unilever.ventures from @unilever lead our Series A round, with participation from @lorealboldventures from @lorealparis @lorealgroupe and the Skywalker Family Office. This is as epic as it gets.

When we started 6 years ago - our ambition was to make the best hair-care products that India has experienced. It took two pandemics, multiple disruptions, lots and lots of hard work, intense amounts of research, consumer engagements, packaging iterations, product innnovations, and a few near-death experiences to build what we have been able to create - a brand that we are all truly proud of. And we're just getting started. LFG! 🔥
latestPosts.alt: Photo by Dhruv Madhok in New Delhi with @dhruvbhasin1987, @unilever, @arata.in, @unilever.ventures, and @lorealboldventures.

latestPosts.caption:
Ever since our #SharkTank episode aired, the orders are rolling in like confetti 🎊 and we’re loving every minute of it!! 🎉

Our team is hustling round the clock to make sure your goodies reach you in a flash. With every package, it’s all love & gratitude 🙏 

Thanks a ton for being part of our awesome journey! 🙌
.
.
.

And here’s the BIG news I’ve been waiting to share!

Colors Infinity’s original show, The Inventor Challenge is here! 
A reality show that gives a platform to India’s finest inventive minds and their BIG ideas. 🤝🏻

I am absolutely excited to be a part of it as this season’s panellist!

Premiering on 27th August, Saturday at 8 PM, only on @colorsinfinitytv and The Inventor Challenge YouTube channel.

@colorsinifinitytv @lomotif_india

latestPosts.caption:
Celebrating #IndependenceDay with hair beauty that’s proudly Made in India and perfected for Indian hair- because every strand deserves authentic, sustainable love.✨

[Made in India, Independence Day, Research and innovation centre, Hair solutions, Hair care, Hair beauty, Shampoo manufacturing, Best shampoo for Indian hair, How is shampoo made, Natural hair care routine, Beautiful hair made easy, Arata]

We're in the mood to share some Arata love. Take a leap of faith and drop your comments 💗

#arata #trending #hairbeautyexpert #beautifulhairwitharata

Don’t forget to checkout full Podcast!! 

Arata founders tell us about their Shark Tank journey and how they built their 100 crore brand by selling shampoos and hair care products. 

We will also discuss how to select the perfect haircare product for you, what things to look for your in your shampoo, what to avoid. If you are looking for good personal care products like Shampoo, Conditioner, Hair Gel, Hair Cream etc then you should definitely watch this video. 

You will also be able to decide which shampoo is best for dry hair, frizzly hair, dandruff, hair fall, 

We will also talk about how to create your own D2C brands and which niches to focus on if you want to become a D2C founder. 

They also share their shark tank stories, moments from the pitch, how they convinced Vineeta & Namita to invest in their startup.

They also share the dark secrets of the personal care industry. How the top brands use animals for testing their products, the cruelty free campaign launched by big brands like Body Shop and interesting insights of brands such as Drunk Elephant.

#SharkTank #Entrepreneurship #HairCareTips #ShampooTips #PersonalCare #D2CBrands
